title: We’re Never Getting An Obi-Wan Movie So Stop Asking - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 08.14.18
description:
Tim and Nick talk about the likelihood of getting a stand alone Obi-Wan Kenobi movie, delve deeper in the Mulan movie, and watch a bunch of fun clipz.

-Ewan McGregor says there are no plans for an Obi-Wan movie starring him (30:15 mins)
-Mulan first production screen (32:55 mins)
-Don Cheadle voicing Donald Duck is everything (34:06 mins)
-Costco is currently accepting returns of the 1-year moviepass subscription (36:40 mins)
-Star Trek: Discovery has found its Spock actor in actor Ethan Peck (37:15 mins)
-Eco-friendly open-air urinals cause uproar in Paris (38:53 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
